name: Double Shot (itch) (bigcat_smauls)
description:
Submission for United Game Jam, theme "Two"

This game is a hyper-casual food based game. Orders come in, coffees go out. The goal is to see the highest level you can reach.

The player will need to manage two orders at a time. Each coffee order, left and right, will be controlled by each hand. The left hand using WASD and the right, the arrow keys. It is a challenge to test their dexterity.

Controls

WASD AND Arrow Keys

Orders for left (WASD) and right (Arrows) coffees will appear at the bottom of the screen below each mug. For each order you will need to click the corresponding key shown below to successfully complete and be given a new order.

S & DOWN - Coffee

A & LEFT - Cream

D & RIGHT - Sugar

W & UP - Whip

Assets

Cafe Model - CGTrader user, udzign-homework

Background Music from Bensound.com

Sound Effects from freesound.org:

creek23 - cha ching

leszek szary - game over

keykrusher - microwave beep

scrampunk - itemize

loyalty freak music - buzzer

inspectorj - pop low a h1
